permafrost.tundra.lang

Class TableHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • permafrost.tundra.lang.TableHelper

  • public final class TableHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    A collection of convenience methods for working with two dimensional arrays.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String DEFAULT_ROW_SEPARATOR
      The default separator string between rows of a table when converting it to a string.

      • nullify

        public static <T> T[][] nullify(T[][] table)
        Converts each string in the given table to null if it only contains whitespace characters.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The component type of the table.
        Parameters:
        table - The table to be nullified.
        Returns:
        The nullified table.

      • blankify

        public static <T> T[][] blankify(T[][] table)
        Replaces nulls with blank strings in the given table.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The component class of the table.
        Parameters:
        table - The table to be processed.
        Returns:
        A new table containing all items in the given table but with nulls replaced with blank strings.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If given table is not an instance of String[][].

        Parameters:
        table - The two dimensional array to be converted.
        Returns:

        Type Parameters:
        T - The type of item in the table.
        Parameters:
        table - The table to be normalized.
        Returns:
        A new copy of the given table whose class is the nearest ancestor of all contained items.
